modShortDescription: If you managed to kill a really bad guy, you're gaining like nothing. This 7 Days to Die mod reworks of all entities(Except traders) you're gaining XP from.
modDescription:
It was really sad, that, if you managed to kill a really bad guy, you’re gaining like nothing. This 7 Days to Die mod reworks of all entities (Except traders) you’re gaining [XP](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-experience/) from. 5 times the HP of the entity = XP.

Compatibility: A18+

**Changes:**  
1.0.1: Missed zombieFemaleFat and [zombie](https://7daystodiemods.com/zombie-mods/)Arlene

[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/jsvqacoigc8znct/Claymore_HP_X_5_Equals_XP.zip)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15031-claymores-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/)
